name: Logging Camps
description: Temporary settlements focused on harvesting timber provide work and access to valuable building materials. The dangerous work creates health risks, while the forest surroundings can hide bandits or dangerous wildlife.
atmosphere: Temporary settlements of rough-hewn cabins house crews harvesting valuable timber while massive logs pile in organized stacks. The air fills with sawdust and resin as heavy equipment processes the forest bounty. Dangerous but profitable work in the wilderness frontier.
